name: Add a new record to an Airtable table from a new Delighted response
description:
Every time a new response is collected in Delighted, a new record containing response details will be added to an Airtable table of your choice.

Your target Airtable table should have these columns before you start configuring the template:
1) Created at	
2) Person	
3) Email	
4) Survey type	
5) Score	
6) Comment	
7) Permalink

The template is processing the "Thumbs" survey type. More about Delighted survey types can be found [here.](https://help.delighted.com/article/530-survey-types-overview)
